definition: ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket between Hong Kong and Sanya on Dragonair.
sentences.chinese: 港龙航空公司来回香港至三亚经济客位机票乙张。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Bohol via Manila on PR.
sentences.chinese: 宿雾航空公司来回香港至保和经马尼拉经济客位机票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Xiamen on KA.
sentences.chinese: 港龙航空公司来回香港至厦门机票。

sentences.english: He couldn’t afford a plane ticket.
sentences.chinese: 因为机票钱对他来说太贵了。

sentences.english: The only option left with me was to ask her to go the airport for getting her ticket re-scheduled.
sentences.chinese: 留给我的唯一选项就是叫她去机场重新预订机票。

sentences.english: The problem cost of10 months is estimated at about US$4,000, including airfare.
sentences.chinese: 估计十个月的学费和机票费约为4，000美圆。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and San Francisco on SQ.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡航空公司来回香港至三藩市机票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Kaohsiung on KA.
sentences.chinese: 港龙航空公司来回香港至高雄机票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Sydney on QF.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲航空公司来回香港至悉尼机票。

sentences.english: All the morning flights get being booked up.
sentences.chinese: 所有明早的飞飞机票都预定光了。

sentences.english: Bob borrowed two thousand dollars from me, for he didn't have enough money to buy an airplane ticket.
sentences.chinese: 鲍伯向我借了两千元，因为他没有足够的钱买飞机票。

sentences.english: For airline , train, ship tickets reservations and Reconfirmations , please contact with the Business Centeter.
sentences.chinese: 机票或确认机票，请与商务中心联系。

sentences.english: For airline , train, ship tickets reservations and Reconfirmations , please contact with the Business Centeter.
sentences.chinese: 机票或确认机票，请与商务中心联系。

sentences.english: They have bought their air tickets already.
sentences.chinese: 她们已经买好了飞机票。

sentences.english: I’d like to reconfirm my flight reservation.

definition: to change one's reservation/to transfer to a different flight, airline, bus or train
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
flight and hotel (travel package) (abbr. for 機票加酒店|机票加酒店[ji1 piao4 jia1 jiu3 dian4])
to bounce (a check)/to return a ticket/ticket refund
